original_title: DC Cowboys Exposed: On Stage & at Play
overview: The DC Cowboys Dance Company, an all-male, gay dance company,  on stage recorded live at Greenberg Theater, American University, Washinton DC; and at play for a photographic marketing campaign for Artists Inn Residence, Dupont Circle. And the making of the the 2007 calendar. Showcasing live performances, photo shoot footage with some nudity and fun interviews with the dancers.
title: DC Cowboys Exposed: On Stage & at Play
